label: API call to skeleton
name: customFlow
description: This flow step will send generic request to skeleton

inputs.label: Url
inputs.name: url
inputs.description: The method and path to which this package is to send requests in a generic way.

inputs.label: Headers
inputs.name: headers
inputs.description: Let the client and the server pass additional information with the HTTP request in a key value format. (e.g. key=ABC123)

inputs.label: Query Params
inputs.name: params
inputs.description: Parameters attached to the end of a url in a key value format. (e.g. key=ABC123)

inputs.label: Body
inputs.name: body
inputs.description: Content to be sent to the server.

inputs.label: Follow Redirects
inputs.name: followRedirects
inputs.description: Follow the redirects when a HTTP request is executed

inputs.label: Download
inputs.name: download
inputs.description: Indicates that the resource has to be downloaded into a file instead of returning it in the response.

inputs.label: File Name
inputs.name: fileName
inputs.description: If provided, the file will be stored with this name. If empty the file name will be calculated from the URL.

inputs.label: Connection timeout
inputs.name: connectionTimeout
inputs.description: Connect timeout interval, in milliseconds (0 = infinity). Default value: 5000 ms (5 sec)

validation.message: The time must be a valid placeholder or a positive integer greater than or equal to 0.

inputs.label: Read timeout
inputs.name: readTimeout
inputs.description: Read timeout interval, in milliseconds (0 = infinity). Default value: 60000 ms (60 sec)

validation.message: The time must be a valid placeholder or a positive integer greater than or equal to 0.
